title: Viscera Cleanup Detail House of Horror-CODEX
description:
Viscera Cleanup Detail - House of Horror (c) RuneStorm

Release Date: 12/2017 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Gore

Long ago in the early 1990's, on a gloomy Halloween night in an
old, cursed house, a wicked force began to stir. Foolish mortals
dabbled in things they did not understand and could not comprehend
Evil was unleashed. The hapless fools that brought chaos back into
the world were slaughtered.. And now it falls to you to set things
right. You must wash away the stains of evil

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/413160/

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

NOTES: This release is standalone and includes the following DLC:

>Viscera Cleanup Detail - Soundtrack
>Viscera Cleanup Detail - House of Horror

The game is updated to current version 1.092

CODEX | RELOADED | DARKSiDERS | Blackbox | SKIDROW | RAZOR1911
